summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 10th Avenue South from Connecticut Street to a point 120 feet south of Atlantic Street on the west, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; in accordance with Resolution No. 9405 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of " Payment in Bonds".
